fixes.name: Is High Performing
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Revenue Tier] = "High" &&
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profitablity Tier] = "High Margin",
    "Yes",
    "No"
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF with AND to DAX IF using &&. All column references were transformed to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format: [Revenue Tier] -> 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Revenue Tier], [Profitablity Tier] -> 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profitablity Tier]. This is created as a calculated column because it performs row-level logical evaluation between fields without aggregations or parameters.
